column4: i wish to edit the etc/fstab file. however it says readonly and i cant add anything. any suggestions
it says authentication rejected and the file that opens up has nothing in it.plus when i try to save it it says it cant
looks good, what's the output of 'ls -l /etc/fstab'
that looks ok too.  when i run 'gksudo gedit /etc/fstab' I get the authentication warning but it opens the correct file.  I'm not sure what's wrong sorry
: nw thanks for ur help anyway
